name: Beautiful Garden
description:
You wake up in a strange house filled with a bizarre  atmosphere.  What happen to the people living here and why everything is so misplaced?  Discover the truth hidden behind a beautiful garden and unravel the disappearance of the people living in this house.....

Beautiful Garden is an atmospheric horror game where you navigate through a bizarre environment while trying to learn more about the story behind the house and the garden in front of it.

This game was made as a prototype to test out the idea and see if it work out or not and some settings might not fully work. If this prototype work out, Beautiful Garden will be a part of an episode of another project called Dream tape
